TopicTitle: KSP Realism Overhaul- SPH Texture bug

Articles.Content:
After installing a fresh KSP RO, I went into the SPH and noticed this bug with the SPH textures, this isn't gamebreaking, but it is very annoying. PLEASE HELP!!!

Bug:

![AKE864q.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/AKE864q.jpg)

Mod List:

![B1KdoJh.png](http://i.imgur.com/B1KdoJh.png)

Game Log:

[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzwBQu9jNY8cQzI5WTEydXg4M0U/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzwBQu9jNY8cQzI5WTEydXg4M0U/view?usp=sharing)

Thank you!

You're using DX11 mode. KSP doesn't fully support it, and that's the result. I'm quite sure RO does not recommend using force-dx11 (it recommends, if anything, -force-opengl) so...you must have picked that up somewhere.
Ahh perfect!!! Thank you so much!
